text: Lebanon participated in the 2007 Asian Winter Games held in Changchun, China from January 28, 2007 to February 4, 2007. This country was represented by 1 athlete in the snowboarding competition.2007 Asian Winter Games athletes by NOC ==Snowboarding== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="4"|Qualification !colspan="4"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Run 1 !Run 2 !Best !Rank !Run 1 !Run 2 !Best !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Marwa El Hage |align=left|Women's halfpipe |5.2 |6.5 |5.2 |8 |colspan=4 align=center|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Asian Winter Games Category:Lebanon at the Asian Winter Games
title: Lebanon at the 2007 Asian Winter Games
